Dataset Structure/ Metadata

Name, Text

GRE (Graduate Record Examination) Score, Integer From 0 to 340

TOEFL Score, Integer From 0 to 120

University Rating, Decimal from 0 to 5

SoP (State of Purpose) Grade, Decimal from 0 to 5

LoR (Letter of Recommendation) Grade, Decimal from 0 to 5

CGPA (Cummulative Grade Point Average), Decimal from 0 to 10

HasResearch ?, Enum 1 - YES, 0 - NO

Admission Chance, Decimal From 0 to 1
